title: carrot cake
directions: beat next 4 ingredients until well blended
add carrots and walnuts and stir together
pour batter into greased and floured pan

for icing mix one package cream cheese, 1/2 cup sweet butter, 3.5 cups icing sugar, 1 tsp vanilla and 1 Tbsp orange juice. Can refrigerate if too runny. can also double the recipe. Ice the cake and garnish with walnuts and cinnamon
